package.name: sass
package.description: Syntactically Awesome Stylesheets (compiles to css)

package.name: sass-svg
package.description: Inline SVG for Sass.

package.name: sass-sandal
package.description: a basic sass library, included reset css and some basic mixin and so on

package.name: sass-spec
package.description: Test suite for testing compatibility with the Sass Stylesheet language.

package.name: sass-stream
package.description: Simple streaming sass compiler. Handles .scss and .sass - converts .sass files to .scss before compiling via node-sass

package.name: sass-scale
package.description: Responsive css properties

package.name: sass-semver
package.description: A lightweight semantic version parser in Sass.

package.name: sass-shady
package.description: Configurable vignettes as scss mixins

package.name: sass-spring
package.description: pure CSS spring animations

package.name: sass-slicer
package.description: Sass Responsive 'slicer', a tool set for breakpoints

package.name: sass-space
package.description: a set of css class names for quick and easy spacing using css classes.

package.name: sass-spacing
package.description: SASS mixins for margin and padding. Plus a compiled set of responsive margin and padding classes.

package.name: sass-stylesheet
package.description: Package all scss code into one file

package.name: sass-ast
package.description: Sass abstract syntax tree generator

package.name: sass-dry
package.description: DRY your SASS code.

package.name: sass-mq
package.description: mq() is a Sass mixin that helps manipulating media queries in an elegant way.

package.name: sass-rem
package.description: Sass mixin and function to use rem units with pixel fallback.

package.name: sass-yiq
package.description: Create more natural color contrasts

package.name: sass-mix
package.description: Library of useful sass mixins

package.name: sass-npm
package.description: Include SASS files using their NPM module name

package.name: sass-fpo
package.description: Sass mixin to create CSS-Only placeholder images

package.name: sass-bem
package.description: Amazing package for sass to write bem classes, with namespaces and more advanced features.

package.name: sass-em
package.description: Sass function and mixin to convert px in em.

package.name: sass-kit
package.description: A collection of Sass functions & mixins

package.name: sass-map
package.description: Sass Unpack cut a sass project in multiple css files
